MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton, affecting properties in Glasgow Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.27am. Our engineers have arrived onsite and confirmed this has been caused by third party damage to our underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11am on Monday 7th December 2020.
